title: SET_TRAIN_STOP_AT_STATIONS
content:
0xECB8B577// SetTrainStopAtStations
void SET_TRAIN_STOP_AT_STATIONS(Vehicle train, BOOL state);Parameters:train: The train handlestate: True to make the train stop at stations. False to make the train not stop at stationsToggles a train's ability to stop at stations
codeBlocks:
// SetTrainStopAtStations
